original_title: PFL Playoffs 2022 - PFL 7: Pettis vs. Ray
overview: The PFL 7 mixed martial arts event for the 2022 season of the Professional Fighters League was held on August 5, 2022, at the Hulu Theater in New York City, New York, United States. This event marked the start of the playoffs for the Light Heavyweight and Lightweight divisions.
title: PFL Playoffs 2022 - PFL 7: Pettis vs. Ray
